title: Week 10 Picks; Baller Position; Giant Number in Death Valley; Teams After Playing Perfect
description:
Rece Davis, Pete Thamel and Bill Connelly make their Week 10 picks in the Race for the Ribeye and discuss a new position for Brock Bowers on the depth chart, a weeknight edition of Pac-12 After Dark, how many points are needed to win between Tennessee and Georgia, why Bill is mad at the College Football Playoff committee, if LSU can stay on schedule, a pivotal point in Texas’ season, the DJU coda game, why Clemson shouldn’t be in the top four, Tulane being in an expanded CFP and if some of the guys on the podcast hate fun.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece Davis, Pete Thamel and Bill Connelly preview Week 10 and make their picks in this edition of the Race For The Ribeye
